name: fSearch
description:
Search layers by name directly from the quick actions bar in the selection or on the whole page.


1. Select layers where you are wanted to search

2. Run quick actions bar

3. Type layers name

4. Click Enter

5. Done! 


You could also look for the layers' names on the whole page. In this case, you don't need to select every element on the page. Just keep the selection empty.
